altTitles.zh-ro: Hu Ru Yi Ye Bing Jiao

altTitles.ja: ワケあり兄妹の禁断愛〜疫病神令嬢は小悪魔〜

altTitles.en: The Yandere Came During the Night

description.en: Yu Xiang unfortunately transmigrates into a merchant's daughter, who was mistakenly taken to the marquis manor at birth. She is immediately disabled, and carries the nickname of 'disaster star'. Helplessly, she can only cling to her older brother, the marquis, in hopes of surviving, and wait for the true master to return so she can give way. Years later, when the true master returns to the manor, Yu Xiang prepares to leave. however, she finds out her clinging technique is too good, that her marquis brother won't let her leave!
description.fr:
Yu Xiang donne, handicapée, échange son coeur avec celui de son frère. 
Après sa mort, elle se réincarne dans le corps d'une fille qui porte le même nom, est paralysée comme elle et qui est surnommée l'étoile malchanceuse. 
Yu Xiang réalise alors qu'elle est dans le roman qu'elle lisait avant de mourir. Synopsis du roman en question : Yu Xiang, fille de marchand a été échangée à la naissance avec la fille d'un Seigneur.
description.zh: 虞襄很不幸穿成了被抱到侯府的商家女，一来就双腿残废，脑袋上还顶着个‘丧门星’的称号。 无奈之下只得牢牢抱住侯爷哥哥的大腿，先把日子混下去，等正主儿回来就麻溜的让位。 几年之后正主儿回归，虞襄包袱款款准备走人，却发现抱大腿的技术太专业，侯爷哥哥不让走了！

altTitles.ja: カビゴンの夢グルメ

description.en: This is a story about Kumura, a student at Grape Academy, who cooks for his Snorlax, who has gourmet tastes. The delicious-looking original dishes drawn by the artist Taku Kuwabara are especially noteworthy!

title.en: Yoku Wakaranai Keredo Isekai ni Tensei Shiteita You Desu

altTitles.ja: よくわからないけれど異世界に転生していたようです

altTitles.en: I Don't Really Get It, but It Seems Like I Was Reincarnated in Another World!

altTitles.zh-hk: 雖然不太清楚，不過我好像轉生到異世界了

altTitles.id: Saya tidak begitu mengerti, tapi sepertinya saya bereinkarnasi di dunia lain

altTitles.vi: Chuyển Sinh Thành Con Gái, Tôi Sẽ Sinh Tồn Tại Dị Giới

description.en: Ren, a young orphan girl, has been sold off to a merchant with sinister plans for her. Suddenly, memories of her past life on a world called Earth come flooding back, and Ren remembers that she used to be a research scientist – and a grown man! As Ren escapes into the Dark Forest, magical powers awaken within her. In order to survive the harsh realities of this world, she must use her rekindled knowledge of Earth’s science as well as her newfound powers! Will her magical cheat powers and past-life knowledge be enough to keep her freedom, or is she doomed to a life of servitude?
description.ja:
「私、おっさんだった！！」

孤児の少女・レンは身売りされる途中で、前世の記憶を取り戻す。レンの前世は、三十代の男性研究者だったが、転生して今まで孤児として生きていたのであった。レンは、その身に秘められた魔法の才能と、前世の科学的知識を駆使して、ひとり過酷な異世界を生き抜いていく。

altTitles.ja: オリジン

description.en: The year is AD 2048. Japan is connected to the Eurasian continent by a transcontinental railroad. The capital, Tokyo, has become a crucible of criminals and terrorists. And so, in the metropolitan darkness a mysterious presence attacks and slaughters people, unnoticed, night after night… Just what are these "things that are not human" living in hiding in the human world? And just who is this "Origin" person who faces them?
description.mn:
2048 онд Япон улс тив дамнасан төмөр замаар "Евро-ази" тивтэй холбогдлоо. Нийслэл хот болох Токио нь алан хядагчид, гэмт хэрэгтнүүдийн төв болж хотын оршин суугчдын дунд ямар нэгэн зүйл анхааралд өртөхгүйгээр шөнө бүр хүмүүсийг алж хядах болов… Хүний нийгэмд нуугдан оршин эдгээр "хүн биш зүйлс" яг юу вэ? Мөн тэдний эсрэг тэмцэх "Орижин" гэгч нь хэн юм бол?  
  
- Won the Grand Prize in the manga category at the 22nd Japan Media Arts Festival in 2019.  
  


---

**Officially published:**  
- In French by [Pika](http://www.pika.fr/catalogue/pika-seinen/origin-30114)  
- In German by [Egmont Manga](https://www.egmont-manga.de/buch-buchreihe/origin/)  
- In Italian by [Panini Comics](http://comics.panini.it/store/pub_ita_it/mmasa037-it-manga-saga-manga-saga-n-37.html)
description.ru: 2048 год нашей эры. Япония связана с евразийским континентом трансконтинентальной железной дорогой. Токио терроризируют банды уголовников и террористы. И ночь за ночью во мраке некто совершает убийства… Только вот являются ли убитые людьми? И кто такой «Прототип», объявивший на них охоту?

altTitles.ja: 君の心を漢字たい

altTitles.id: Aku Ingin Menulis Hatimu ke Dalam Kanji

altTitles.en: I Want to Write Your Heart into Kanji

description.en: A high school boy, Yomi Hashiba, is troubled. He is unable to understand what Mizuki Hanai, a cool girl who became his girlfriend a month ago, is thinking... One day, while he is worrying about his relationship with Mizuki Hanai, he starts to understand her "Kanji"...? (same pronunciation as feeling) This is the beginning of a thrilling coming-of-age romantic comedy about love and kanji!
description.id: Seorang anak SMA, Yomi Hashiba, sedang bermasalah. Dia tidak dapat memahami apa yang dipikirkan Mizuki Hanai, seorang gadis keren yang menjadi pacarnya sebulan yang lalu... Suatu hari, ketika dia mengkhawatirkan hubungannya dengan Mizuki Hanai, dia mulai memahami "Kanji" -nya... ? (pengucapan yang sama dengan perasaan) Ini adalah awal dari komedi romantis dewasa yang mendebarkan tentang cinta dan kanji!
description.es-la: Un chico de preparatoria, Yomi Hashiba, está preocupado. No puede entender lo que está pensando Mizuki Hanai, una chica genial que se convirtió en su novia hace un mes... Un día, mientras se preocupa por su relación con Mizuki Hanai, comienza a entender su "Kanji"... ? (caracter/sentimiento) ¡Este es el comienzo de una emocionante comedia romántica sobre la mayoría de edad sobre el amor y los kanji!

description.en:
Eunho, the strongest in the yokai realm!
He gained the chance to become a human being after losing the woman he loved and killing countless yokai.
After passing the gate of reincarnation by accumulating merit for a thousand years to abandon his immortal body…

He became a human being, held a sword, and learned martial arts for the first time.
But this is very… easy?

altTitles.ja: 悪祓士のキヨシくん
悪祓士〈エクソシスト〉のキヨシくん

description.en: The most powerful exorcist in history--Kiyoshi! In order to protect that which is precious to him, Kiyoshi has attained ultimate strength. But he has a secret he can't tell anyone... Become a sword that slays evil! Become a shield that protects the weak! It all comes together in this new dramatic exorcist battle comedy series!
description.pt-br: O exorcista mais poderoso da história: Kiyoshi Harai! Para proteger o que é precioso para ele, Kiyoshi atingiu a força suprema. Mas ele tem um segredo que não pode contar a ninguém... ele virou a espada que erradica o mal! O escudo que protege os fracos! Tudo se junta nessa nova série dramática de comédia e batalha de exorcistas!

title.en: Teihen Ossan, Cheat Kokusei de Isekai Rakuraku Life

altTitles.ja: 底辺おっさん、チート覚醒で異世界楽々ライフ

altTitles.en: Bottom-Tier Old Man, Living the Easy Life in Another World with Cheat Powers

description.en: Reincarnated from a bottom-tier salaryman to an adventurer, he possessed only one skill: [Game]. A seemingly dead-end second life enveloped in games even in another world…
description.ja: 底辺サラリーマンから底辺冒険者へ転生するが、持っていたスキルは【ゲーム】。異世界に来てまでゲーム三昧の、先がない二度目の人生……。

title.en: I Turned off the Pain Perception Setting!

altTitles.en: I Said I Turned off the Pain Perception Setting!
I'm Telling You, I Already Turned off the Pain Perception Setting!
You Turned off the Pain Setting?
I Turned off the Pain Setting?

altTitles.ja: 100回目プレイヤーなので高好感度はエンリョします！

altTitles.es-la: ¿Se me ha olvidado desactivar la configuración del dolor?

description.en:
**Pain perception 0, capture rate is 100!**

A virtual reality game with pain perception set to '0'. I was the first to clear all endings, and started the final 100th playthrough... but something is off. Suddenly, I have a strange disease with a terminal setting, and the capture target characters are starting to worry about me.

"I don't feel any pain, so should I pretend to be sick?"

Before I knew it, to the capture target characters, I became a noble hero enduring pain and sacrificing for world peace. Since it has come to this, the concept for this playthrough is a terminally-ill hero throwing herself for the world! I must end it with a happy ending. This is my last playthrough in my life!
description.mn:
Өвдөлтийн мэдрэмж 0, Барих хувь 100!
Виртуал ертөнцийн тоглоомны өвдөлтийн мэдрэмжийн тохиргоог "0" болгосон. Би бүх төгсгөлийг нь дуусгасан цор ганц, тиймээс энэ бол миний 100 дахь оролдлого...гэхдээ сонин байна. Гэнэтхэн, эмчлэгдхээргүй өвчинтэй, бас гол дүрүүд миний төлөө санаа зовж эхэлсэн.
"Би ямар ч өвдөлт мэдрэхгүй болохоор, дүр эсгэх нь зөв юм болов уу?"
Намайг мэдхээс өмнө, энэ гол дүрүүдэд би энэ дэлхийн амар амгалангийн төлөө өөрийгөө золиослох баатар болчихсон байсан. Одоо өнгөрснөөс хойш, энэ оролдлогын концепц бол энэ ертөнцийн төлөө өөрийгөө золиослох! Би заавал аз жаргалтай төгсөх хэрэгтэй. Энэ бол миний сүүлчийн оролдлого!

title.en: Hana wa Saku, Shura no Gotoku

altTitles.ja: 花は咲く、修羅の如く

altTitles.es-la: Las flores florecen, tal como Asura

altTitles.vi: Đoá Hoa Nở, Tựa Tu La

description.en:
Hana, who lives on Tonaki Island, a small island with a population of 600, loves reciting so much that she holds public reading sessions for the children of the island. Mizuki feels that Hana's "reading" has the power to attract people, and invites her to join the broadcasting club, of which she is the head.

"Tell me your true wish and I'll make it come true."
"I want to join the broadcasting club."

Hana decides to join the club, and has many "firsts" with the members of the broadcasting club, deepening her love of reciting...
description.ja:
人口600人の小さな島・十鳴島に住む花奈は、島の子供たちに向けて朗読会を行うほど朗読が好きだった。花奈の〝読み〟に人を惹きつける力を感じた瑞希は、自身が部長を務める放送部へ誘う。

「お前の本当の願いを言え、アタシが叶えてやる」
「私、放送部に入りたいです」

入部を決意した花奈は、たくさんの〝初めて〟を放送部のメンバーと共にし、大好きな朗読を深めていく…。
description.th:
ฮานะอาศัยอยู่บนเกาะโทนาคิ เกาะเล็ก ๆ ที่มีประชากรเพียง 600 คน ซึ่งไม่มีคนที่อายุรุ่นราวคราวเดียวกันกับฮานะอยู่เลย เธอผู้ชื่นชอบการอ่านออกเสียง ได้จัดงานอ่านออกเสียงให้เด็ก ๆ บนเกาะฟังมาตั้งแต่สมัยยังอยู่ ป.4 ทำให้เธอเป็นขวัญใจของเด็ก ๆ
ต่อมาในวันก่อนที่เธอจะขึ้นม.ปลายหนึ่งวัน ก็ได้พบกับอุซุรากิ มิซุกิ รุ่นพี่ชมรมกระจายเสียงในโรงเรียนม.ปลาย สุโมโมะกาโอกะ ที่เธอกำลังจะไปเข้าเรียน...
และนั่นก็คือก้าวแรกสู่การเปลี่ยนแปลงของฮานะ
description.vi: Hana là một cô gái sống trên hòn đảo nhỏ Tonaki với dân số chỉ tầm 600 người, cô thích đọc diễn cảm đến mức tổ chức các buổi đọc cộng đồng cho trẻ em trên đảo. Nhận thấy tài năng "đọc" của Hana có sức cuốn hút người khác, Mizuki mời cô tham gia câu lạc bộ phát thanh tại trường mà cô là trưởng nhóm. - "Nói cho chị biết mong muốn thực sự của em đi, chị sẽ biến nó thành hiện thực." - "Em muốn tham gia câu lạc bộ phát thanh." Hana quyết định tham gia câu lạc bộ và có được những "trải nghiệm đầu tiên" với các thành viên của câu lạc bộ phát thanh, tình yêu với việc đọc diễn cảm của cô từ đó càng trở nên sâu đậm...

altTitles.en: I'll be Taking Over this Duchy
I'll Take the Dukedom From Today

altTitles.es-la: Tomaré el Ducado a Partir de Hoy

description.en:
"I was a noble this whole time?!"

Hilde, a commoner who works at a restaurant in the village, is suddenly notified by a handsome man named Logan that she is a family member of one of the empire's four duchies and hears that her mother 'Lucia Arpeggio' was a powerful mage in the past.

Duke Arpeggio offers to make her an official member of the family if she can prove that she has strong magical powers, and Hilde accepts in order to escape from her oppressed commoner livelihood and enjoy a comfortable life.

However, her excitement doesn't last long… Culture, magic, history, literature, etc. The number of things nobles needed to learn were endless! In addition, forget about welcoming Hilde, her family members only sent her cold looks and even put her life in danger…

"You've left me with no choice. I, a former commoner, will be taking over this duchy!"
description.pt-br:
"Eu era uma nobre esse tempo todo?!"

Hilde, uma plebeia que trabalha em um restaurante na vila, é repentinamente notificada por um homem bonito chamado Logan de que ela é membro da família de um dos quatro ducados do império e ouve que sua mãe 'Lucia Arpeggio' era uma poderosa maga no passado.

O Duque Arpeggio ofereceu torná-la um membro oficial da família se ela puder provar que tem fortes poderes mágicos, e Hilde aceita para escapar de seu sustento oprimido e desfrutar de uma vida confortável.

No entanto, sua empolgação não dura muito... Cultura, magia, história, literatura, etc. O número de coisas que os nobres precisavam aprender era infinito! Além disso, esqueça a recepção de Hilde, seus familiares apenas lhe lançaram olhares frios e até colocaram sua vida em perigo…

"Vocês não me deram escolha. Eu, uma ex-plebeia, assumirei este ducado!"

altTitles.ja: メリーさん

description.en:
Mary-san who calls you on the phone, telling you she's nearby...nothing but a prank call, right? Witness the cute and charming life she lives!

This is based on the Japanese urban legend Mary-san.  If it makes no sense at all to you, see https://www.kowabana.net/2018/06/09/mary-san/ and it will be a lot more comprehensible, while still being cute.

title.en: Shokubutsu Monster Musume Nikki ~Seijo datta Watashi ga Uragireta Hate ni Aruraune ni Tensei Shite Shimatta node, kore kara wa Kougousei wo Shinagara Shizuka ni Shokubutsu Life wo Sugoshimasu~

altTitles.ja: 植物モンスター娘日記　～聖女だった私が裏切られた果てにアルラウネに転生してしまったので、これからは光合成をしながら静かに植物ライフを過ごします～

altTitles.en: Plant Monster Girl Diary ~I was a saint, but I was betrayed and reincarnated into Alraune, so from now on I will spend my plant life quietly while photosynthesizing~

description.en:
Who knew that even a stationary plant could be surprisingly capable?!

Our protagonist is a saint—or was, until she was betrayed by one of her fellow saint apprentices as well as her fiancé, a hero. 
In her final moments, she recalls her previous life, when she was just a normal Japanese high school girl, but that doesn't help the fact that she's being eaten alive by a massive plant monster.

And yet, by a stroke of luck, she doesn't die for good, but instead reincarnates as said plant monster. With the upper half of a human and the lower half of a plant, she must now spend her life as an Alraune.

And so, she tries to live the peaceful life of a plant, photosynthesizing all day!
Welcome to the diary of a plant girl who just wants some peace and quiet, but something always gets in her way!

[web novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4444ge/) (jp)

---
description.ja:
植物なので動けないんですが、意外となんとかなります!?
魔王討伐の旅の途中、後輩の聖女見習いと婚約者だった勇者に裏切られ、殺されてしまった聖女。
死の間際、日本の女子高生だった前世を思いだすが、役には立たず花のモンスターに食べられることに。
気がつけば、女子高生＆聖女の記憶を持ったまま、上半身は人、下半身は植物のモンスター・アルラウネに転生していた。
よし、だったら光合成しながら静かに暮らそう！
平穏無事な日々を望むもそうはいかないモンスター娘の徒然日記。

altTitles.es: No subestimes al personaje de apoyo

altTitles.ja: 傍観者、●●ちゃん

description.en:
Hyejung loved to read to escape her daily stress. But that's before she woke up inside the bizarre world of her favorite novel! Instead of the main heroine who courts three eligible men, she is now Latte Ectrie - a minor villain that everyone hates?! One way or another, it's a chance to live out her most beloved storyline, with popcorn in hand to watch all the drama! Taking charge of the narrative takes on a whole new meaning!

---

**Contents:** 139 + 30 (epilogue) + 9 (side story) = 178 chapters
- **Vol. 1:** main story (ch. 1-139)
- **Vol. 2:** epilogue (ch. 140-169)
- **Vol. 3:** side story (ch. 170-178)

description.fr: Elle se réveille un jour dans son roman préféré. Ce serait l'occasion de briller, sauf qu'on lui a donné un rôle de potiche absolue ! Aucun moyen d'approcher l'héroïne ni les 3 hommes qui lui tournent autour comme des mouches. Pas grave, elle arrivera coûte que coûte à exister ici !
description.id: Aku, bertemu dengan tiga pria ganteng seantero negeri. Putera mahkota, Bangsawan termuda sampai pemilik neraka sihir, Mereka semua mendambakan satu orang perempuan, Evelyn. Dia adalah temanku. Ketiga pria itu mendekati Evelyn dengan cara masing-masing. Lalu aku? Hanya menonton di pojokan saja. Bentar... Sepertinya aku pernah melihat eh maksudku membaca adegan ini.. Apa?! ruapanya aku berada di dalam dunia novel kesukaanku??!!
description.ja: 突然の目眩に襲われて目覚めると愛読していた小説の世界に引き込まれてしまった！？しかも女主人公をいじめる雑魚キャラ「ラテ・アクトリー」に転生…！！ どうせ人生唯一の楽しみである小説がリアルに堪能できれば満足と思いきや… 傍観者でいるつもりがだんだん目立ち始める「ラテ」 果たしてイケメンとの恋は成就するのか…！？
description.ko:
깨어나보니 내가 가장 좋아하는 소설 속에 들어와 버렸다!
그런데 주인공도 악역도 아닌… 눈물 나는 분량의 ‘들러리’라고?

현실에 치여사는 스물 다섯 학원 강사 김혜정! 그런데 즐겨 읽던 소설 <야수의 꽃> 세계로 떨어져 소설 속 인물 ‘라테 엑트리’가 된다.

…그런데 기왕 들어오게 해 준거 소설 속 미남들과 썸 좀 타는 주인공이 되게 해주지. 
여주인공을 괴롭히다 털릴 예정의 조연 라테 엑트리가 되어버리다니! 
에휴~ 그러면 그렇지 내 팔자야.

그래, 기왕 이렇게 된 거 열심히 구경이나 하자!
어차피 소설 보는 재미로 살아왔던 인생! 소설이 눈앞에서 실현된다는데 어찌 마다하겠는가! 
팝콘이나 먹으며 구경하지 뭐. 와작!

그런데 조연이었던 라테는 오히려 소설 속에서 자신의 존재감을 점점 내보이게 되는데…? 
소설 속의 들러리양의 파란만장한 구경기가 시작된다!
description.zh: 一睁开眼…竟然穿越到了我最近在追的小说里？可是为啥不按套路出牌，没有女主命的我竟然穿越到一个没有一丁点戏份的悲催小配角身上？事已至此我还是努力给自己加戏吧！抢在女主出场前跟三个男主来一场完美的邂逅，实现穿越人生的逆袭之路！

altTitles.ja: ゴーアンゴー

description.en: Eigo Nitta, new student in Hoyo high school, is enrolled in the baseball team. Talented as fast pitcher but lacking in term of technique, Eigo Nitta aims to be the new pitcher of the team. He has to face many opponents, which creates an atmosphere of competition in the baseball team. However he and his teammates will have to find a way to solve the rivalry among the baseball team in order to go to Koshien tournament.

title.en: During the Live Streaming, I Proposed to a Female Ghost - And She Actually Agreed?!

altTitles.zh: 直播整活，我向女鬼求婚——她居然真答应了？！

altTitles.zh-ro: Zhibo Zheng Huo, Wo Xiang Nv Gui Qiuhun - Ta Juran Zhen Dayingle?!

altTitles.en: During the Live Broadcast, I Proposed to a Female Spirit - And She Said Yes?!
I Proposed to a Ghost Girl During the Livestreaming - And She Actually Agree?!

altTitles.vi: Tôi Livestream Cầu Hôn Nữ Quỷ Vậy Mà Thành Công!?

description.en: For the sake of the show’s effect, Fang Ning invited a cheap drama crew to prepare for an overnight live broadcast at the Princess Tomb. However, unexpectedly, something happened midway through the live broadcast – Fang Ning mistook a female ghost for a cast actress and proposed to her directly! Now, what should he do if she takes it seriously?!

altTitles.ja: この世界は不完全すぎる

description.en: Haga is one of the debuggers that gets stuck in the world of an incomplete VR game. Though he eradicates a monster from a village, the destruction event that ends with the villagers' deaths triggers without fail. However, Nicola, the villager girl he saves, revives before his eyes.
description.ja: 極秘に組織された調査隊「王の探索者」（キングス・シーカー）の一員である主人公・ハガ。この世のあらゆる事象を調べ、王命を受け旅をする探索者は村人からも尊敬されていた。任務の一環でドラゴンの襲撃から村を守ることに成功するハガ。成り行きで助けた少女・ニコラと世界を探検することになるが、ハガの真の目的は冒険ではなく…。
description.pt-br: O protagonista Haga é um membro da equipe de investigação secreta chamada "Os Buscadores do Rei" (Kings Seekers). Os exploradores, que investigam todos os fenômenos deste mundo e viajam sob ordens do rei, são respeitados pelos habitantes das aldeias. Haga consegue proteger uma vila do ataque de um dragão como parte de uma missão. Por acaso, ele acaba ajudando uma garota chamada Nicola e começa a explorar o mundo com ela. No entanto, o verdadeiro objetivo de Haga não é a aventura…

altTitles.ja: ようこそ、305号室へ

description.en: Junghyun Kim, who had a normal upbringing, and his roommate Homo Kim.This is the sensitive, embarrassing story of these two who are different in every way.

He stood at the pinnacle of the world. Surpassing all since birth in the art of the sword. But fate has left him crippled moments before reaching the apex. But the story continues and the legend will rise again…

---
- **Note:** 2nd Place in 15th Chinese Golden Dragon Manhua Awards
description.fr: Il se tenait au sommet du monde. Surpassant tout depuis la naissance dans l'art de l'épée. Mais le destin l'a laissé infirme quelques instants avant d'atteindre le sommet. Mais l'histoire continue et la légende renaîtra…
description.zh: 天下最风流的剑客，名曰沈三公子。 天下最有名的剑法，唤作万藏剑经。 天下最强大最神秘的地方，是为弃剑山庄。 每周六早上九点准时更新~

title.en: Kanojo to Kare no Kankei ~Heibon na Hayakawa-san to Heibon na Miura-kun no Hibon na Kankei~

altTitles.ja: 彼女と彼の関係 〜平凡な早川さんと平凡な三浦くんの非凡な関係〜

description.en:
"I wish I had a girlfriend, I don't even care who—"
"Really? Anybody? Even me?"

Kaho, who has never had a boyfriend before, wanted to have a male-female relationship.
Takumi, who wanted a girlfriend, just happened to be talking about it in front of her.
description.ja:
「誰でもいいから、彼女になってくれんかねー」
「本当に誰でもいい？　私でも？」

男女交際に興味があるのに、彼氏はいたことがない高校２年生の早川夏帆。ある日、同級生の三浦拓海が彼女を欲しがっていることを知って、勢い余ってその場で交際を申し込んでしまった！履歴書で自己紹介、「恋人とやりたいことリスト」の共有、初めてのふれあい――。二人の不思議な関係は「お試し交際」を通じて段々深まっていって……!?
description.pt-br:
"Eu quero tanto uma namorada que me contentaria com qualquer uma a esta altura." 
"Sério? Qualquer uma? Até mesmo eu?" 

Kaho, que nunca teve um namorado antes, queria entrar em um relacionamento entre um homem e mulher.
Takumi, que queria uma namorada, por acaso estava falando sobre isso na frente dela. Uma história de amor emocionante sobre amadurecimento!

title.en: Onna no Karada ga Iya nano de Mune o Torimashita

altTitles.ja: 女の体が嫌なので胸を取りました

altTitles.ja-ro: Onna no karada ga iyananode mune o torimashita

altTitles.en: I Hated My Female Body, so I Cut Off My Breasts

description.en:
The author, who is non-binary (seeing themselves as neither male or female), chronicles their decision to have top surgery. 
Essays on the actual experience, from planning the surgery, to what happened afterwards.

title.en: I, The Invincible Villain Master With My Apprentices

altTitles.zh: 反派师尊的我带着徒弟们天下无敌

altTitles.zh-ro: Fǎnpài Shī Zūn De Wǒ Dàizhe Túdìmen Tiānxià Wúdí
Fanpai Shi Zun De Wo Daizhe Tudimen Tianxia Wudi

altTitles.en: My Villainous Master Brings Along the Peerless Apprentices

altTitles.tr: Ben, Çıraklarımla Birlikte Yenilmez Kötü Ustayım

altTitles.sv: Jag, den oövervinnelige elaka Mästaren och mina lärlingar

description.en: Shen Shi was very disappointed when he transmigrated into the book he wrote and didn't even end up as the protagonist. He also didn’t understand why the invincible hero became a girl? Even worse, why did all his apprentices want to become his wife instead! The protagonist asked him, “Master! Would you like to take me right now? Or do I have to kill off the other apprentices first before you'll have me?”
description.tr: Shen Shi çok üzgündü. Neden yazdığı kitaba gittiğini ve ana karakter olmadığını anlamadı. Ölümsüz erkek ana karakter neden kadındı? Daha bir çok şeyi anlamadı. Çırak yetişimcisi olmak istediği belliydi, bu yüzden herkes onun çırağı olmak istedi. Ana karakter: “Usta! Bugün önce beni mi yiyeceksin, yoksa bütün büyük kız kardeşleri öldürdükten sonra mı beni yemek istiyorsun?”
description.zh: 沈适感觉很难过。 他就不明白了，为什么穿越到了自己写的书里，还不是主角。 他也不明白，龙傲天男主角，为什么变成了女的？ 他更不明白，明明要养成的是徒弟，为什么一个个的都想上位当师娘？ 主角：“师父！你今天是要先吃我呢，还是我干掉所有师姐，你再吃我呢？”

altTitles.ja-ro: Jijyou wo Shiranai Tenkousei ga Guigui Kuru

altTitles.pt: O Aluno Sem Noção Transferido É Assertivo

altTitles.ja: 事情を知らない転校生がグイグイくる。

altTitles.zh-hk: 什麼情況都不知道的轉校生一個勁的湊過來。

altTitles.uk: Цей безглуздий переведений учень такий настирливий.

altTitles.en: The Clueless Transfer Student Is Assertive.

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Primeiro Amigo é um Tapado

description.en: Akane Nishimura is a shy and gloomy elementary school girl with an unfounded dire reputation in her class due to her appearance. Taiyou Takada is a transfer student in her class who came from a small countryside school, and who is fascinated by the aspects of Nishimura that her classmates use to pick on her, finding her "darkness" cool beyond compare. Through the unbridled and fundamental joy Takada finds in being her friend, Nishimura starts realizing that being herself is not as bad as she thinks.
description.uk: Акане Нішімура — сором’язлива та похмура дівчинка початкової школи, яка через свою зовнішність має безпідставну жахливу репутацію у своєму класі. Тайо Такада — новий учень, який перевівся з невеликої сільської школи, і якому подобається унікальність Нішімури, яку її однокласники використовують, щоб познущатися з неї, вважаючи, що її «темрява» виглядає моторошно. Через нестримну та фундаментальну радість, яку проявляє Такада, будучи її другом, Нішімура починає розуміти, що бути собою не так вже й погано, як вона думала.
description.pt-br: Nishimura é uma garota retraída, hostilizada por todos os colegas por seu jeito sombrio, que dizem até que ela é a Morte em pessoa. Mas isso só chama ainda mais a atenção de Takada, um novo aluno transferido. Sem saber o motivo do apelido, que por sinal ele acha super-maneiro, Takada começa a se aproximar mais e mais da Nishimura para se tornar amigo dela. Uma história cativante, cheia de nostalgia dos nossos tempos de fundamental, sobre uma amizade que vai aquecer seus corações!

description.en:
Ryoka is awakened by flurry of text messages from her mother! Panicked and rushed, Mom is clearly concerned for Ryoka's safety, but she is not to keen on letting her daughter know why. Her reasoning being that nothing could really properly describe what is happening!  
  
The world might be ending! And there might be a massive new life-form on the roof of their apartment building!  
  
(Denpa)

altTitles.ja: 純喫茶カメリアのみどりさん

description.en: Here is a quaint, old-fashioned café where the scent of freshly brewed tea always lingers. The owner, Midori Hanatsubaki, is a somewhat eccentric lady with a fondness for black tea. Together with her newly hired part-time employee, Daisuke Kise, they open the café for another lively day.
description.ja:
そこは、いつでも淹れたての紅茶が香る昔ながらの喫茶店。
店主の花椿みどりさんは、少し不思議な紅茶好きのお姉さん。
最近入ったアルバイトの黄瀬大助くんと一緒に、今日も元気に開店です――。

altTitles.ja: 理想のオトコ

description.en: The story begins when a man ten years younger, a man of the same age, and then a man ten years older appeared in front of our heroines, who had taken a break from love. A coworker, a husband, a colleague, a one night stand… Do they truly understand their feelings, and are troubled by being together? You don’t have to be with your soulmate… Is it enough to be with a man who fits your ideals?

altTitles.ja: センシティブ・ボーイ

description.en:
Kaede, a victim of past sexual abuse, is obsessed with becoming "normal" ...  

A bittersweet story about a boy facing coming-of-age questions about love, sexuality, complexes, and other troubles.

title.en: Tsuihousareru Tabi ni Skill o Te ni Ireta Ore ga, 100 no Isekai de 2-shuume Musou

altTitles.ja: 追放されるたびにスキルを手に入れた俺が、100の異世界で2周目無双

altTitles.en: I Got a New Skill Every Time I Was Exiled, and After 100 Different Worlds, I Was Unmatched
Unmatched in 100 Different Worlds — I Gain a New Skill Every Time I Get Banished

altTitles.es: Cada vez que me Expulsaban, Adquiría una Nueva Habilidad y Después de 100 Mundos Diferentes, Ya no Tengo Rival

altTitles.zh-hk: 每遭放逐就能獲得技能的我，在100個世界大開第二輪無雙

altTitles.zh: 每遭放逐就能获得技能的我，在100个世界大开第二轮无双

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsuihousareru Tabi ni Skill wo Te ni Ireta Ore ga, 100 no Isekai de 2-shuume Musou

altTitles.pt-br: Ganhei uma Nova Habilidade Toda Vez que Fui Exilado, e Após 100 Mundos Diferentes, Me tornei Imbativel

description.en:
An adventurer named Ed was exiled from his party because he was considered useless, but instead of being sad and upset he was actually happy!!?

It turns out that it's not without reason that he feels happy when he's exiled from his party, because every time he's been exiled he will receive a skill that makes him even more invincible...

Ed was given the crazy test of having to get expelled from 100 Hero parties in 100 different worlds before he could return to his original world. Finally a mysterious and divine entity said that he had achieved all the conditions to return to his original world.

However, as a final condition he is asked “Look at the fate of one of these exile worlds after you left.” and he is shocked by what he sees.

“Okay, I’ll do it! I’ll go down to these 100 worlds again and be banished with a good feeling!” 

Ed takes on a new challenge to make full use of the super-powerful “Exiled Skills” that were granted each time he was exiled, and this time ensure they all have happy endings.
___
**Character Designer:** [GreeN](https://mangadex.org/author/40916d07-ed66-40d9-919f-3bfff091fe9a)
description.es: Ed, a quien se le dio la loca prueba de tener que ser expulsado de la party de 100 héroes en 100 mundos diferentes para poder regresar a su mundo original, finalmente cumpliendo las condiciones puede volver. Sin embargo Ed se entera de que el otro mundo al que quiere regresar ha tenido un final desastroso. Ahora para salvar a una chica elfa quien una vez fue su amiga, tendrá que volver a desafiar una nueva batalla para aprovechar al máximo la "habilidad de expulsión" para cambiar todos los finales de una forma convincente. ¡Comienza una historia para salvar 100 mundos diferentes!
description.id:
Seorang petualang bernama ed di keluarkan dari party nya karena di anggap tidak berguna, namun daripada sedih dan kesal dia malah bahagia!!?.

Ternyata bukan tanpa alasan dia merasa baagia ketika di keluarkan dari party nya di karenakan setiap kali dia di keluarkan dia akan menerima sebuah skill yang membuatnya jadi semakin tidak terkalahkan...
description.pt-br:
Um aventureiro chamado Ed foi expulso de sua equipe porque era considerado inútil, mas em vez de ficar triste e chateado, ele ficou feliz!!?

Acontece que não é sem razão que ele se sente feliz quando é expulso de uma equipe, porque toda vez que isso acontece, ele recebe uma habilidade que o torna ainda mais invencível...

Ed recebeu um teste maluco: ele teria que ser expulso de 100 equipes de Heróis em 100 mundos diferentes antes de poder voltar ao seu mundo original. Finalmente, uma entidade misteriosa e divina disse que ele havia cumprido todas as condições para retornar ao seu mundo original.

No entanto, como condição final, ele é desafiado: "Olhe o destino de um desses mundos de exílio depois que você partiu." E ele fica chocado com o que vê.

"Ok, eu vou fazer isso! Vou voltar para esses 100 mundos e ser banido com uma boa sensação!"

Ed assume um novo desafio: fazer pleno uso das superpoderosas "Habilidades de Exílio" que foram concedidas a cada vez que foi expulso, e desta vez garantir que todos tenham finais felizes.

altTitles.ja: お願い、脱がシて。

altTitles.vi: Làm ơn, giúp tớ cởi nó xuống!

description.en:
There is a curse on this school. It prevents the person who commits "impure acts" from taking off his or her panties. Only the right hand of the protagonist can break the curse and remove the panties, his name is Kamite.

Kamite tells the girls that they have been cursed and that he can take off their panties, but... obviously it is almost unacceptable for them to have any man take them off...!

This is how the girls end up in a lot of trouble. But if the panties are not removed, they can get into even more trouble...
description.es: Hay una maldición en esta escuela. La cual, le impide quitarse la ropa interior a toda persona que cometa "actos impuros" dentro de la escuela. Solamente la mano derecha de Kamite es capaz de romper la maldición y quitarles la ropa interior. Él les menciona a las chicas que han sido maldecidas y que es capaz de quitarles la ropa interior, pero… ¡Obviamente es casi inaceptable para ellas que un hombre cualquiera se las quite…! Así es como las chicas terminan pasando por momentos de confusión. Pero, si no les es quitada la ropa interior, puede que tengan algo que lamentar.
description.pt-br: Existe uma maldição nesta escola. Que impede que a pessoa que cometa “atos impuros” tire sua calcinha. Só a mão direita do protagonista consegue quebrar a maldição e tirar a calcinha, seu nome é Kamite. Kamite fala para as garotas que elas foram amaldiçoadas e que ele pode tirar sua calcinha, mas… obviamente é quase inaceitável para elas que um homem qualquer a tire…! É assim que as garotas acabam passando por vários perrengues. Mas se a calcinha não for retirada, elas podem ter mais problemas ainda.

title.en: Moto Kizoku Reijou de Mikon no Haha Desuga, Musumetachi ga Kawaii Sugite Boukenshagyo mo Ku ni Narimasen

altTitles.ja: 元貴族令嬢で未婚の母ですが、娘たちが可愛すぎて冒険者業も苦になりません
元貴族令嬢で未婚の母ですが、娘たちが可愛すぎて冒険者業も苦になりません＠COMIC

altTitles.ja-ro: Moto Kizoku Reijou de Mikon no Haha Desuga, Musumetachi ga Kawaii Sugite Boukenshagyo mo Ku ni Narimasen＠COMIC

altTitles.en: Even Though I'm a Former Noble and a Single Mother, My Daughters Are Too Cute and Working as an Adventurer Isn't Too Much of a Hassle

altTitles.th: อดีตขุนนางสาวโสดกับชีวิตโลดโผนผจญภัยเพื่อลูกสาวสุดน่ารัก

altTitles.zh: 虽然是原贵族大小姐单身妈妈，但女儿太可爱了当冒险者也不会辛苦

description.en:
A world where monsters run rampant.

A noblewoman falls from grace and loses everything after being falsely accused.

But, she started a fresh life as an 'Immortal.' She became an adventurer capable of defeating disaster-rank monsters and taking the heads off ancient dragons with a single swing of her blade. However, behind that cool exterior… beats the heart of a ridiculously over-indulgent mother?!

"What should I do, my daughters are just too cute?!"

She wields her deadly sword for the sake of motherly love! Ogres flee and dragons tremble at the sight of this overpowered adventurer!

The fantasy adventure of the Doting Mother Sword Demon begins now!

altTitles.ja: 美味しんぼ

description.en:
Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

title.en: Kaijin Mira no Dai 2 Keitai ga Kawaisugiru

altTitles.en: Monster Mira's Second Form Is Way Too Cute

altTitles.ja: 怪人ミラの第2形態が可愛すぎる

altTitles.vi: Quái Nhân Mira Có Hình Thái Thứ Hai Dễ Thương Quá Đi!

description.en:
Cuteness is unbeatable!

Monster Mira is on another rampage, aiming to steal the hero's transformation belt. Having just reached full power thanks to the Doctor's modifications, Mira's new form turns out to be way too cute!

A romantic comedy where justice and evil refuse to back down!
description.vi: Dễ thương tương đương bất khả chiến bại! Quái nhân Mira lại tác oai tác quái hòng chiếm đoạt đai biến hình của người hùng. Nhờ việc được Tiến Sĩ cải tiến để tối ưu sức mạnh, Mira đã có được một hình thái mới, và hình thái này cưng vãi ò luôn!Đón đọc ngay câu chuyện romcom giữa hai thế lực thiện ác chí chóe không ai nhường ai nha!

description.en:
Children who are beginning their youth.  
Their growing pain on their way to spring.

title.en: Drawing: Saikyou Mangaka wa Oekaki Skill de Isekai Musou Suru!

altTitles.ja: ドローイング 最強漫画家はお絵かきスキルで異世界無双する！

altTitles.en: Drawing: The Greatest Mangaka Becomes a Skilled “Martial Artist” in Another World

altTitles.zh-hk: 作畫 最強漫畫家利用繪畫技能在異世界開無雙！

altTitles.vi: Drawing: Mangaka Mạnh Nhất Với Kỹ Năng Vẽ Tranh Vô Song Tại Dị Giới

description.en:
Akira Kamishiro was a very successful manga author, who was diagnosed with blood cancer one day. He regretted the way he lived, where he could only build up empty relationships. Angry at his mother for asking him to send her some money, he died in a car accident. He was given a chance to choose his new mother and reincarnate in another world.

Akira, not wanting to have a repeat of his past life, decided to choose an ordinary but safe life.. He was reincarnated as Akira, the only son of a magic store, with his previous life's memories. He had no talent for swordsmanship or magic, but he didn’t care as he was still loved by his family. At one point, he realized that he can embody various things by "drawing a picture". That's when he noticed his cheat ability...!?
description.ja: 漫画家として大成功を収めていた神代彰は、成功だけに囚われて人間関係を蔑ろにし続けた自分の人生を後悔しながら死んでしまう。そんな彰を待っていたのは、自分で母親を選んで異世界転生するチャンス！？転生した彰は剣術も魔法もダメダメだったが、家族に愛されながら平穏な生活を送っていた。しかしあるとき、「絵を描く」ことでいろいろなものを具現化できるチート能力に気がついてしまって……？
description.vi: Akira, một họa sĩ tài năng nhưng sau khi bị bệnh ung thư anh đã nhận ra xung quanh mình chẳng còn gì ngoại trừ cái danh hiệu "thành công" của mình. Không có người đi cùng mình đến bệnh viện, người mẹ, người thân duy nhất của anh cũng đòi anh đưa tiền mới chịu đi cùng anh. Trong cơn giận anh đã vô tình gây tai nạn và được chuyển sinh sang thế giới khác. Một thế giới mới với một cuộc sống mới anh quyết định sống một cách bình thường và giữ gìn hạnh phúc gia đình nhỏ nhoi của mình
description.pt-br: Akira Kamidai lamenta ter conseguido construir apenas uma relação vazia, embora tenha feito muito sucesso como cartunista. Uma vida em um lugar medíocre onde eu queria que Akira fosse uma pessoa com magia. Reencarnação em uma loja voltada para a esgrima. Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Eu estava vivendo uma vida ideal para uma família amada por espadachins. Descobri a habilidade de trapaça que encarnar várias coisas atravéz de um ”desenho”…? Uma aventura mundial diferente para proteger seu paradeiro, tecida por Akira que quer levar uma vida normal...!

description.el:
H Άι Χόσινο είναι ένα ανερχώμενο μουσικό είδωλο, η οποία ανακοίνωσε ξαφνικά οτι θα πάρει ενα διάλειμμα από το μουσικό της γκρουπ, Μπι-Κομάτσι, για λόγους υγείας. Προς εκπλήξη ενός από τους μεγαλύτερους θαυμάστες της, του γυναικολόγου Γκόρο Αμεμίγια, μια μέρα η νεαρή Αϊ εμφανίστηκε στο νοσοκομείο οπού δουλεύει. Ο Γκόρο έρχοντας πλεον πρόσωπο με πρόσωπο με την αδυναμία του, τρέμει στο γεγονός ότι η 16-χρονη Αϊ είναι έγκυος... με δίδυμα με τον πατέρα άφαντο. Αποφασισμένη να αποκτήσει την δικιά της οικογένεια και να συνεχίσει την δουλεία της ως είδωλο, έχει σκοπο να κρατήσει την γέννα των παιδιών της μυστικο, μαζί με την βοήθεια του Γκόρο.

Το δυνατότερο όπλο ενός ειδώλου ειναι τα ψέματα.
Μια ίστορια μυστηρίου και εξαπάτησης, όπου η σκοτεινή πλευρά της σόου-μπιζ αποκαλύπτεται κάτω από τις στρώσεις ψεμάτων και εκμεταλεύσεων.
description.en:
The story begins with a beautiful girl, her perfectly fake smile, and the people who love her selfishly for it.  
  
What transpires behind the scenes of the glittering showbiz industry? How far would you go for the sake of your beloved idol? What would you do if you found out reincarnation was real? The star of the show is Aquamarine Hoshino and the stage is but a mere facade. Will he manage to reach the climax before the world of glamour swallows him whole?
description.es:
'Oshi no Ko' explora la vida de una abrumadoramente hermosa heroína y muestra la industria del entretenimiento desde un punto de vista nunca antes visto.

- [Wikipedia](https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oshi_no_Ko)
description.fa: آی هوشینو ۱۶ ساله یک آیدول با استعداد و زیباست که هواداران زیادی داره؛اون نماد پاکیه، ولی ظاهر با باطن قضیه متفاوته. گورو هوندا یک پزشک زنان که ساکن حومه‌ی شهره که یکی از طرفداران بزرگ آی هستش، ولی ناگهان آیدول مورد علاقه خودش رو ملاقات میکنه و متوجه میشه که اون بارداره، گورو به اون قول میده که بچش رو سالم بدنیا بیاره، ولی اون نمیدونست که این ملاقات باعث عوض شدن زندگیش میشه.
description.fr:
L'histoire commence avec une belle fille, son sourire parfaitement faux, et les gens qui l'aiment égoïstement pour cela. Que se passe-t-il dans les coulisses de la brillante industrie du showbiz? Jusqu'où iriez-vous pour votre idole bien-aimée ? Que feriez-vous si vous découvriez que la réincarnation est réelle? La star du spectacle est Aquamarine Hoshino et la scène n'est qu'une simple façade. Parviendra-t-il à atteindre le point culminant avant que le monde du glamour ne l'avale tout entier?  


---

- [Nominated for the 14th annual Manga Taisho awards.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2021-01-24/14th-manga-taisho-awards-nominate-10-titles/.168759)

- [Wikipedia](https://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oshi_no_ko)
description.ja: 「この芸能界（せかい）において嘘は武器だ」　地方都市で、産婦人科医として働くゴロー。芸能界とは無縁の日々。一方、彼の“推し”のアイドル・星野アイは、スターダムを上り始めていた。そんな二人が“最悪”の出会いを果たし、運命が動き出す…!?
description.ru:
Что, если бы дорога в шоу-бизнес была открыта для тебя с самого начала?  
Новая серия оригинальной манги от двух известных авторов — Акасака Ака («Госпожа Кагуя: в любви как на войне») и Ёкояри Мэнго («Тайные желания отвергнутых»). Это совершенно новая работа, в которой мир шоу-бизнеса предстаёт перед читателями в очень необычном свете: у лидера идол-группы Хосино Аи есть секрет, о котором никто не должен знать…  


---
- [Wikipedia](https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oshi_no_Ko)
description.vi:
Câu chuyện khởi đầu với sự xuất hiện của một cô gái xinh đẹp, mang nụ cười giả tạo hoàn hảo, và có những người yêu cô ấy một cách ích kỷ bất chấp điều đó.

Điều gì diễn ra đằng sau ánh hào quang của thế giới showbiz? Con người ta sẽ làm đến mức nào vì thần tượng yêu quý của mình? Bạn sẽ làm gì nếu phát hiện ra luân hồi chuyển kiếp là có thật? Nhân vật chính của chúng ta - Aquamarine Hoshino liệu có hoàn thành được khát vọng báo thù trước khi bị thế giới hào nhoáng ấy nuốt trọn? Hãy cùng đón xem bộ truyện được sáng tác bởi bộ đôi tác giả của Kaguya-sama và Kuzu no Honkai.
description.es-la:
La historia comienza con una hermosa chica, su sonrisa perfectamente falsa y la gente que la ama con egoísmo gracias a eso.
  
¿Qué ocurre detrás de la brillante industria del espectáculo? ¿Hasta dónde llegarías por el bien de tu ídolo? ¿Qué harías si descubrieras que la reencarnación es real? La estrella del espectáculo es Aquamarine Hoshino, y el escenario no es más que una mera fachada. ¿Conseguirá llegar al clímax antes de que el mundo del espectáculo se lo trague por completo?
description.pt-br: Doutor Goro é obstetra em um hospital do interior e se encontra longe do mundo em que brilha e evolui Aï Hoshino, uma cantora de sucesso crescente da qual é fã absoluto. O que ele ainda não sabe é que sem mais nem menos ele se encontrará com sua idol favorita em uma circunstância um pouco fora do normal. Terá ele tempo suficiente para ficar perto dela ou o mundo irá girar de maneira cruel para ele? Essa é uma história sobre o mundo do entretenimento japonês.

description.en:
***“Huh? Who are you calling losing?”***

As the background of the class, I, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, witnessed a popular girl–Anna Yanami, getting rejected by another guy.

_“Even though he said we’ll get married. Don’t you think he’s pretty mean?”
“When did he say that?”
“When we were 4 or 5 years old.”_

That doesn’t count, right? With this, the losing heroines like Remon Yakishio from the Track and Field Club, and Chika Komari, from the literature club.

_“Nukumizu-kun. There are two types of girls. Childhood friends or cheating cats.”
“I see. Well, that’s a bold statement.”_

There’s a fortune for those who shine only after losing. Losing Heroines—The curtain to the mysterious coming-of-age story “Makeine” opens now!
___
**Character Designer:** [Imigimuru](https://mangadex.org/author/341a08ca-acbf-49a3-998a-d3451249ec43)

**Additional Links:**  
- [Official LN (JP)](https://www.shogakukan.co.jp/books/09453017)
- [Alternative Raw](https://shogakukan-comic.jp/book-series?cd=51545)
description.ja:
クラスの背景モブ高校生こと温水和彦は、男子に人気のクラスメート・八奈見杏菜が幼馴染にフラれるのを目撃してしまう。
仕方なく八奈見を慰める温水だが、それをきっかけに、様々な負け感あふれる女子たちに絡まれることになり――!?
負けヒロイン――マケインたちと辿る謎の青春が、ここに幕を開ける！
負けてこそ輝く彼女たちに、幸いあれ。
description.vi:
“Hử? Cậu gọi ai là đồ thua cuộc cơ?”

Tôi, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, một nhân vật làm nền trong lớp, chứng kiến cảnh cô nàng nổi tiếng – Anna Yanami bị một nam sinh khác từ chối.

“Dù cho cậu ấy đã từng nói bọn mình sẽ kết hôn đấy. Cậu có thấy cậu ấy quá đáng không?”

“Cậu ấy nói thế vào lúc nào vậy?”

“Hồi bọn tớ 4 hay 5 tuổi gì đó.”

Thế thì đâu có tính?

Cùng với cô nàng còn có những nữ chính thua cuộc khác như Remon Yakishio của Câu lạc bộ Điền kinh và Komari Chika từ Câu lạc bộ Văn học.

“Nukumizu-kun nè, trên đời có hai loại con gái. Một là bạn thuở nhỏ, còn lại là đồ đàn bà giựt bồ.”

“Vậy hả. Chà, một tuyên bố đầy táo bạo ha.”

Có một loại vận mệnh rằng có những người chỉ thực sự toả sáng sau khi đã thua cuộc.

Những nữ chính thua cuộc—Bức màn câu chuyện tuổi mới lớn mang tên “Makein” sẽ lật mở ngay bây giờ!
description.es-la: "¿Eh? ¿A quién llamas perdedor?" Como fondo de la clase, yo, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, fui testigo de cómo una chica popular -Anna Yanami- era rechazada por otro chico. "Aunque dijo que nos casaríamos. ¿No crees que es bastante malo?" "¿Cuándo dijo eso?" "Cuando teníamos 4 o 5 años". Eso no cuenta, ¿verdad? Con esto, las heroínas perdedoras como Remon Yakishio del Club de Atletismo, y Chika Komari, del club de literatura. "Nukumizu-kun. Hay dos tipos de chicas. Las amigas de la infancia o las gatas tramposas". "Ya veo. Bueno, esa es una declaración audaz". Hay una fortuna para los que brillan sólo después de perder. ¡Heroínas perdedoras-El telón de la misteriosa historia de madurez "Makeine" se abre ahora! ["Makeine" es la abreviación del nombre del manga]
description.pt-br: O simples, chato e sem amigos Nukumizu Kazuhiko testemunhou algo completamente desconcertante: a garota popular Yanami Anna foi colocada na friend zone por seu crush e amigo de infância! Na verdade, todas as garotas populares ao redor dele estão sendo rejeitadas da mesma forma pelos garotos de quem gostam. Sem perceber, Kazuhiko se envolve no drama do relacionamento onde todas as heroínas principais estão perdendo o amor! Ele pode manter o ânimo delas e ajudá-las a encontrar a felicidade?

description.en:
Yeoju is a second-rate author living a mediocre existence in modern-day Korea. A tragic accident lands her in the plot of a bestselling martial arts novel and she wakes up as the infamous villainess Haewon Tang. Hoping to save herself from a gruesome death, Yeoju must figure out who to trust, harness Haewon’s inner chi, and learn martial arts as she fights to save the Sichuan Tang Clan. Can she change the outcome of the novel and prove she’s the worthy hero?

---
Our main character was an unsuccessful romance fantasy novelist when she gets into a hit-and-run then wakes up as the villainess in a best-selling martial arts novel. She uses the information from the novel that she had analyzed in her original life, in order to avoid her death-ending and finding the truth behind what had really happened to her.

---

Elle utilise les informations du roman qu'elle avait analysées dans sa vie d'origine, afin d'éviter sa mort et de découvrir la vérité sur ce qui lui est réellement arrivée.

Főszereplőnk egy sikertelen romantikus regényíró, aki autóbalesetet szenved és egy másik világban tér magához. Abban a világban, amiről nemrég olvasott. Méghozzá a regény gonosztevőjeként, aki elnyerve méltó büntetését a végén meghal. Csakhogy főszereplőnknek esze ágában sincs meghalni, helyette kiaknázza a sztori ismeretében és saját harcművészeti tudásában rejlő lehetőségeket.

description.id:
Seorang penulis novel romansa fantasi mengalami kecelakaan tabrak lari, tapi begitu sadar kembali, ia menyadari dirinya jadi Dang Haewon, pemeran pembantu dalam novel yang pernah ia baca. Namun, Dang Haewon adalah tokoh jahat dan kejam yang mencoba membunuh pemeran utama wanita demi mendapatkan pemeran utama pria hingga mengakibatkan dirinya terbunuh. Tidak mau nasibnya berakhir seperti itu, si penulis pun memanfaatkan semua informasi yang didapatkannya sewaktu membaca novel itu. Akankah dia berhasil mengubah nasibnya dan jadi tokoh terkuat di novel itu?

description.it:
Un'autrice di secondo ordine, Yeoju, si ritrova all'interno della trama di un bestseller wuxia, rivestendo i panni della famosa e spietata Haewon Tang. Nella speranza di fuggire da una morte orribile, Yeoju imparerà a utilizzare le arti marziali e a combattere per l'incolumità del Clan Sichuan Tang. Saprà volgere a suo favore la trama del romanzo dimostrando di essere una degna eroina?

description.ja:
現代でロマンスファンタジー作家をしていたはずなのに……　 「南宮世家の若当主」を読んで武侠系の小説家に転向しようとしていた矢先、交通事故に遭って小説の世界に異世界トリップ…！？ しかもそこでの私は最強の悪女”唐海苑”！ 唐海苑が死ぬという物語の結末を知っている私が、このままみすみす犬死するわけにはいかないでしょ！ 未来はこの手で変えてみせる…！

description.ko:
"하필이면 주인공도 아니고,
소설 속 제일가는 악녀라니…"

월세 탈출을 위해 읽기 시작한 무협 소설 『남궁세가 소가주』
그중 최고 악녀 당해원으로 빙의하게 된다.

흠모하던 남자를 얻기 위해
남자의 정인에게 독약을 먹이고,
무림의 고수들을 이간질하고,
마교의 앞잡이가 되어 강호를 혼란에 빠뜨리는
…세계관 최고 악녀, 당해원.

"소설처럼 이렇게 당할 순 없어...!!"

우연히 삼킨 만년삼으로 인해
세계관 최강자가 되어버린
무협 소설 속 최고 악녀 "당해원"의 갱생기!

description.pl:
Nasza główna bohaterka była marną powieściopisarką romansów fantasy, aż pewnego dnia została potrącona w wypadku i obudziła się jako czarny charakter w bestsellerowej powieści o sztukach walki. Wykorzystuje informacje z powieści, które przeanalizowała w swoim pierwotnym życiu, aby uniknąć śmierci i odkryć prawdę o tym, co tak naprawdę się z nią stało.

description.ru:
Наша главная героиня была несостоявшейся писательницей фантастических романов, но когда ее сбивает машина, она просыпается злодейкой в романе-бестселлере боевых искусств. Она использует информацию из книги, которую она проанализировала в своей настоящей жизни, чтобы избежать смерти и найти правду о том, что же случилось с ней на самом деле.

description.th:
ตัวเอกก็ไม่ใช่ แต่มาเป็นตัวร้ายที่ร้ายที่สุดในนิยายเนี่ยนะ…' 
เมื่อนักเขียนอย่างฉันอยากจะลองเปลี่ยนสไตล์การเขียน จึงเริ่มต้นอ่านนิยายกำลังภายในเรื่อง 『นายน้อยแห่งตระกูลนัมกุง』 และเพราะอุบัติเหตุ จู่ๆ ก็ดันได้เข้ามาสิงอยู่ในร่างของทังแฮวอน วายร้ายในนิยายเรื่องนั้นซะได้
เธอร้ายถึงขนาดที่วางยาพิษหญิงสาวผู้เป็นที่รักของชายหนุ่มที่นางรัก แถมยังยุยงให้เหล่าชาวยุทธ์ในยุทธจักรแตกคอกันอีก เท่านั้นยังไม่พอ นางยังทำให้คนของลัทธิปีศาจเข้ามาสร้างความวุ่นวายในยุทธภพอีกด้วย
แต่ฉันจะไม่ยอมมีจุดจบแบบทังแฮวอนในนิยายหรอกนะ ฉันจะมีชีวิตใหม่ ด้วยการเป็นวายร้ายที่แข็งแกร่งที่สุดให้ดู!

description.tr:
Ana karakterimiz başarısız bir romantik fantezi romanı yazarıydı ve bir vur-kaç olayından sonra, çok satan bir dövüş sanatları romanındaki kötü adam olarak uyandı. Orijinal hayatında analiz ettiği romandan gelen bilgileri, ölümünü önlemek ve başına gerçekten ne geldiğinin arkasındaki gerçeği bulmak için kullanır.

description.zh-hk:
「不但不是主角，還偏偏是書裡最惡毒的女人...」

為了擺脫租屋生活
而開始閱讀武俠小說《南宮世家少主》，
卻穿越成為了小說裡最惡毒的女人——唐海媛。

唐海媛這個天下第一惡女為了得到欽慕的男人，
不惜毒殺思慕之人的情人、挑撥武林高手們、
成為魔教的走狗並導致武林動盪。

「絕不能和原本的故事內容一樣，白白送死!!」

偶然吃了萬年參而變成小說世界裡的最強者，
武俠小說最強惡女「唐海媛」的重生記!

---

altTitles.en: The Rise of Tanaka in Another World

altTitles.ja: タナカの異世界成り上がり

description.en:
Tanaka, a 32-year-old man, gets caught up as a bystander while the hero is summoned to another world. His stats are mediocre and skills are unremarkable, but Tanaka remains positive and decides to have fun in this new world, saying, "Since I'm here, I want to use magic!" 

What will he encounter on his journey while meeting reliable companions?!

title.en: Onii-chan Is Done For! - Highschool ONIMAI (Doujinshi)

description.en: Without being able to return to being a man, Mahiro Oyama stayed as a girl since middle school and now has become a beautiful high-schooler who gets completely dominated by his first friend since the transformation, Momiji Hozuki, who has gotten really tall and became popular with the girls in their school.
description.pt-br: Sem poder voltar a ser homem, Mahiro Oyama permaneceu como uma menina desde o ensino fundamental e agora se tornou uma linda estudante do ensino médio que é completamente dominada por sua primeira amiga desde a transformação, Momiji Hozuki, que ficou muito alta e se tornou  popular entre as meninas da escola.

altTitles.th: ขบวนการกำมะลอ

altTitles.ja: 戦隊大失格

description.en:
Thirteen years ago, suddenly the Villainous Army of evil appeared in their gigantic floating castle 10000 meters in the sky to invade Earth!

The villainous army have reviving capabilities that make them immortal, making them a serious threat to humanity. To protect us against these invaders, the Divine Dragon Rangers, the Dragon Keepers, wield their miraculous powers and their weapons, Divine Tools, and continuously fight for our safety!

The assault of the Villainous Army! The vigilance of the Dragon Keepers! Will they succeed in their conquest…?

From Haruba Negi, the creator of *5Toubun no Hanayome*, comes the action-packed superhero series of a lifetime!
description.es: ¡Hace trece años, el Ejército Villano del mal apareció de repente en su gigantesco castillo flotante a 10.000 metros en el cielo para invadir la Tierra! El ejército villano tiene capacidades de revivir que los hacen inmortales, lo que los convierte en una seria amenaza para la humanidad. Para protegernos de estos invasores, los Rangers Dragón Divino, los Guardianes del Dragón, empuñan sus poderes milagrosos y sus armas, las Herramientas Divinas, ¡y luchan continuamente por nuestra seguridad! ¡El asalto del Ejército Villano! ¡La vigilancia de los Guardianes del Dragón! ¿Tendrán éxito en su conquista? ¡Descúbrelo en la serie de superhéroes llena de acción de toda la vida!
description.fr:
Il y a 13 ans, un château flottant est apparu à 1000 mètres au-dessus du sol et une armée maléfique est venue dans le but d'envahir l'humanité.
Afin de protéger l'humanité contre ces envahisseurs, des super-héros se battent, mais les choses ne semblent pas être comme elles le paraissent !
description.ru: Тринадцать лет назад армия монстров таинственным образом объявилась на территории людей, паря в воздухе на своем летучем замке! Армия монстров обладает различными способностями, которые могут грозить человеческой безопасности. Дабы защитить мирных жителей от вторжения на землю, доблестные герои - Хранители Дракона в составе из пяти человек выходят на поле правосудия! Используя свой туз в рукаве под названием «артефакт», боевой отряд героев из года в год, каждое воскресенье усмиряет неугомонных монстров. Однако, спустя 999 поражений, один из членов команды монстров решает отомстить героям!.. С этого момента и разворачивается наша история борьбы добра со злом!
description.pt-br: Há treze anos, de repente, o Infame Exército do mal apareceu em seu gigantesco castelo flutuante 10.000 metros no céu para invadir a Terra! O exército vilão tinha capacidades de reviver, o que os tornava imortais, tornando-os uma séria ameaça para a humanidade. Para nos proteger contra esses invasores, os Divine Dragon Rangers, os Dragon Keepers, manejam seus poderes milagrosos e suas armas, Ferramentas Divinas, e lutam continuamente por nossa segurança! O ataque do Exército Vilão! A vigilância dos Dragon Keepers! Eles terão sucesso em sua conquista...?

title.en: The Rising of the Shield Hero

altTitles.es: El Ascenso del Héroe del Escudo

altTitles.th: ผู้กล้าโล่ผงาด

altTitles.ja: 盾の勇者の成り上がり

altTitles.vi: Sự Trỗi Dậy Của Anh Hùng Khiên

altTitles.pt: A Ascensão do Herói do Escudo

altTitles.vi: Sự Trỗi Dậy Của Dũng sĩ Khiên

description.en:
Naofumi Iwatani, an uncharismatic Otaku who spends his days on games and manga, suddenly finds himself summoned to a parallel universe! He discovers he is one of four heroes equipped with legendary weapons and tasked with saving the world from its prophesied destruction.  
As the Shield Hero, the weakest of the heroes, all is not as it seems. Naofumi is soon alone, penniless, and betrayed. With no one to turn to, and nowhere to run, he is left with only his shield. Now, Naofumi must rise to become the legendary Shield Hero and save the world!
description.ru:
Иватани Наофуми - типичный отаку, которого нагло призывают в другой мир и просят спасти его. Недолго ломаясь, он все-таки решается согласиться, попутно став одним из четырех героев - "Героем Щита". И все бы ничего, если бы парня не ограбили на третий день, да еще и в изнасиловании обвинили… Ограбленный и униженный перед обществом, Наофуми решает найти обидчиков и задать им жару. Помогать с этим ему будет девушка из расы енотолюдей, которую он выкупил у работорговца… 

Адаптация ранобэ Tate no Yuusha no Nariagari от Aneko Yusagi.
description.vi: Sự Trỗi Dậy Của Khiên Anh Hùng - Iwatani Naofumi được triệu tập vào một thế giới song song cùng với 3 người khác để trở thành Anh hùng của thế giới. Mỗi anh hùng lần lượt được trang bị trang bị huyền thoại của riêng mình khi được triệu tập, Naofumi nhận được Khiên huyền thoại làm vũ khí của mình. Do sự thiếu lôi cuốn và kinh nghiệm của Naofumi, anh ta bị coi là yếu đuối nhất, cuối cùng chỉ bị phản bội, bị buộc tội sai lầm và bị cướp đi trong ngày phiêu lưu thứ ba. Bị thu hút bởi tất cả mọi người từ nhà vua đến nông dân, những suy nghĩ của Naofumi không có gì ngoài sự báo thù và hận thù. Do đó, định mệnh của anh ta trong một thế giới song song bắt đầu...

altTitles.ja: 新装版 WORST

description.en: Worst but New Edition
description.vi: Liên minh Kurotaki sụp đổ, quyền lực của King Joe ở Housen dần bị mai một, Zetton bại trận trước Guriko đưa Suzuran vào thế hỗn loạn, Vũ Trang Chiến Tuyến ngày càng mạnh mẽ và bền bỉ... Trước tình cảnh đó thì ở Toaru bất ngờ xuất hiện một chàng trai đến từ ngoại thành mang tên Tsukishima Hana - kẻ mang ước mơ trở thành thủ lĩnh đầu tiên của toàn bộ Cao Trung Nam Sinh Suzuran vốn luôn hỗn loạn!

title.en: Fate/Grand Order Cries of The Avenger  in the Prison Tower

altTitles.ru: Fate/Grand Order Вопль мстителя, заключенного в башне

altTitles.ja: Fate/Grand Order 監獄塔に復讐者は哭く

description.en: The Master, who was in Chaldea just moments ago, now finds himself in a prison filled with monsters and evil creatures, one of which attacks him. However, a mysterious Servant of the Avenger class comes to his aid. Meanwhile, in Chaldea, it is discovered that the Master's soul has been separated from his body and imprisoned in a place called the Château d'If. Will the Master be able to find his way back?
description.ru: Мастер, находившийся пару мгновений назад в Халдее, обнаруживает себя попавшим в тюрьму, кишащую множеством монстров и злых тварей, одна из которых нападает на него. Однако на помощь ему приходит таинственный Слуга класса Авенджер. Тем временем в Халдее выясняется, что душа Мастера оказалась отделенной от тела и запертой в некоем месте, название которому — Замок Иф. Сможет ли Мастер найти дорогу обратно?

title.en: Boku no Kowareta Seigi wa Loop Suru Isekai de Ai to Tsumi wo Tenbin ni Kakeru

altTitles.en: My Broken Justice Weighs Love and Sin on the Scales in a Looping Parallel World

altTitles.ja: ぼくの壊れた正義はループする異世界で愛と罪を天秤にかける

description.en:
The school is suddenly transported to another world, where it is overrun by monsters and turned into hell. 

Okoyo Takumi, who lost his life while trying to escape with his beloved sister, Haruna, realizes that every time he dies he returns to the same time. Takumi is at the mercy of the monsters’ deadly siege and imprisoned in a prison of time that sends him back to the same time every time he dies. 

He continues to struggle, overcoming the rape and death of his loved ones time and time again. After successfully hunting an orc, a fanfare resonates in Takumi’s mind. 

[You leveled up!]
description.ja:
突如異世界に転移した学園は、モンスターたちに蹂躙され地獄と化した。最愛の義姉、春名と逃げようとして命を落とした御好巧は自身が死ぬ度に同じ時間に戻っていることに気づく。

モンスターたちの死の包囲に翻弄され、死ぬ度に同じ時間に巻き戻される時の牢獄に囚われた巧は、愛する者の凌辱と死を何度も乗り越えて足掻き続け――
オークを狩ることに成功した巧の脳裏にファンファーレが響きわたる。

「あなたは、レベルアップしました！」

altTitles.ja: 葬送のフリーレン

altTitles.th: คำอธิษฐานในวันที่จากลา Frieren

altTitles.el: Φρίρεν: Πέρα από το Τέλος του Ταξιδιού

altTitles.de: Frieren: Nach dem Ende der Reise

altTitles.es-la: Frieren: Más allá del fin del viaje

description.el: Έχοντας νικήσει τον βασιλιά των δαιμόνων, το ταξίδι μιας δεκαετίας φτάνει στο τέλος του και μια νέα εποχή ειρήνης ξεκινά. Η ζωή όμως συνεχίζεται, ειδικά για την Φρίρεν, πως ως ξωτικό έχει ακόμα αιώνες ζωής μπροστά της. Με τις δεκαετίες να περνάνε, η Φρίρεν έρχεται αντιμέτωπη με την μεταβλητότητα του κόσμου και την παροδικότητα των ανθρώπων. Μετά από μια τελευταία συνάντηση με όλη την παλιά της ομάδα, συνειδητοποιεί ότι ο χρόνος που πέρασε με τους φίλους της ήταν υπερβολικά σύντομος και ότι δεν θα έχει ποτέ την ευκαιρία να τους μάθει καλύτερα. Έρχοντας αντιμέτωπη με την αλήθεια αυτή, η Φρίρεν αποφασίζει να ξεκινήσει ένα ακόμα ταξίδι αλλά αυτή τη φορά έχοντας σκοπό να μάθει το τι σημαίνει να είσαι άνθρωπος.
description.en: The adventure is over but life goes on for an elf mage just beginning to learn what living is all about. Elf mage Frieren and her courageous fellow adventurers have defeated the Demon King and brought peace to the land. With the great struggle over, they all go their separate ways to live a quiet life. But as an elf, Frieren, nearly immortal, will long outlive the rest of her former party. How will she come to terms with the mortality of her friends? How can she find fulfillment in her own life, and can she learn to understand what life means to the humans around her? Frieren begins a new journey to find the answer.
description.es: Frieren es una elfa, y como para todos los de su raza, los años pasan en un suspiro… pero no es así para sus antiguos compañeros de batalla, a los que Frieren verá morir y envejecer. De repente Frieren se da cuenta de que pese a que la vida avanza a un ritmo más lento para ella, las experiencias con sus seres queridos se le escapan de las manos. Un aire nostálgico envuelve a este manga fantástico tan entrañable que ha vendido ya más de 2,5 millones de copias en Japón.
description.fr:
Que deviennent les héros une fois le mal vaincu ?
Dans ce coffret collector : un jeu de 54 cartes entièrement personnalisé aux couleurs de la série et le manga avec une jaquette alternative réversible !

Alors que Frieren et ses compagnons font halte dans la citadelle de Heiß, Stark propose à Fern d'aller en rendez-vous, sur le ton de la plaisanterie... et contre toute attente, la jeune fille accepte ! Sur les conseils de l'elfe, qui n'y connaît pas grand-chose, le guerrier emmène donc son amie faire le tour de la ville, ce qui leur permet de se rapprocher un peu.

Après cette pause bienvenue, les trois aventuriers repartent sur les routes et arrivent au haut-plateau du Nord, une zone extrêmement dangereuse où pullulent aussi bien des monstres coriaces que des démons retors... Parviendront-ils à survivre dans cette région hostile ?
description.es-la: Tras cumplir su misión de derrotar al Rey Demonio, la maga elfo Frieren, el héroe Himmel, el sacerdote Heiter y el guerrero Eisen regresan a casa después de un viaje de una década donde disolverán su grupo y tomarán sus propios caminos. Pero el tiempo pasa de forma distinta para los elfos, Frieren comienza a ser testigo de como sus excompañeros sufren sus estragos y comienzan a morir lentamente y uno a uno. Antes de fallecer, Heiter el sacerdote, le impone a Frieren un aprendiz humana llamada Fern. Llevados por la afición que tiene la alfa por recolectar hechizos mágicos, ambos emprenderán una aventura, llena de magia e introspección, que los llevará a revisitar lugares que había conocido en su anterior travesía, mientras enfrenta el pesar que le causa descubrir todas las posibilidades que ha desperdiciado en su viaje que le hubiesen posibilitado entablar una relación más cercana con sus compañeros ahora fallecidos.
description.zh-hk: 在打倒了魔王的勇者一行人当中，魔法使芙莉莲是精灵，她和其他三人有不一样的地方。 生活在“之后”的世界里，她感受到了什么—— 留下来的人们所编织的葬送与祈祷又意味着什么—— 故事从“冒险的结束”开始。 这是讲述英雄们的活法的，后日谈奇幻作品！

altTitles.ja: 遥かなるリング
格闘少女伝説遥かなるリング

description.en:
(from [wikipedia.ja](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E9%81%99%E3%81%8B%E3%81%AA%E3%82%8B%E3%83%AA%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B0)):

Yu Takamine was fascinated by the female pro-wrestlers she saw as a child, and overcoming her parents' opposition, she auditioned for and passed the Tokyo Women's Pro Wrestling Association Match to become a pro-wrestler. 

However, this was only the first step to becoming a wrestler. 

This is the story of Yu, an amateur wrestler who is not particularly strong, and her growth as an apprentice, rookie, heel, idol, and senior wrestler as she explores various fighting styles.

title.en: Fate/Grand Order SABER WARS II Side Story: Jane & Ishtar ~A Shooting Star of a Million Light Years~

altTitles.ja: Fate/Grand Order SABER WARS Ⅱ 番外編　ジェーン＆イシュタル～100万光年の流れ星～

altTitles.ja-ro: Fate/Grand Order: SABER WARS Ⅱ Bangai-hen - Jane & Ishtar: 100-man Kounen no Nagareboshi

altTitles.en: Fate/Grand Order SABER WARS II Side Story: Jane & Ishtar ~A Shooting Star of a Million Light Years~

title.en: The Rogue Prince Is Secretly an Omega

altTitles.en: Hiding That the Crazy Prince Is an Omega
Hiding That the Damn Prince Is an Omega
Hiding That the Lout Prince Is an Omega

description.en: Prince Étienne de Frederick was born a dominant omega, but in a world where omegas can’t become the emperor, he must pretend to be a beta due to the empress’s greed. When his childhood friend, Grand Duke Rishar von Eckhart, returns after three years as a war hero, there’s no time to share a happy reunion as Rishar is a dominant alpha and his rival in the fight for the throne. The two continue to maintain a precarious relationship until, one day, Étienne has a sudden heat cycle, and Rishar finds out the truth. “Étienne de Frederick. You were... an omega?”
description.ko: "You... you're an omega?" Prince Etienne was born as a dominant omega, but he lives as a foolish prince pretending to be a beta. The Empress who covets the throne and abuses Etienne, the Emperor who neglects him and remains cold-hearted. Little by little, their support of him is slipping. Meanwhile, his childhood friend Richard returns to the palace as a war hero. Etienne should avoid him, who is a dominant alpha, but his heart is stirred as Richard continues to pay attention to him.

title.en: I Can't Fall in Love With Paperman

altTitles.zh: 我不可能和纸片人谈恋爱

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Bu Keneng He Zhi Pian Ren Tan Lian'ai

description.en: When a BL comic artist transmigrated into the princess of Liao, she resumed her career... but encountered her "dear son" who crawled out of the book and refused to be gay! Faced with a sword to her neck, will she surrender or resist? What's worse, the plot is no longer under her control; who's the mysterious person behind the scenes controlling everything?
